titleStmt.title: A sea of the seed's sufferings through which runs a river of rich rejoycing ... written in the year 1659 in Rome-prison of mad-men, by the extream suffering servant of the Lord, John.
titleStmt.author: J. P. (John Perrot), d. 1671?

notesStmt.note: Running title: A song for that assembly.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
